comment._content: I gather Hurley might have done a bit of cutting and pasting here. Real WW1 aviation action shots tended to look more like this www.flickr.com/photos/smu_cul_digitalcollections/93158051... Hurley did quite a bit of cutting and pasting and re-enacting...
